Yes, I'm doing great, but you know, heh, someone at American Idol doesn't know who Wing is. Eh eh, you're right, Colonel Sanders! You shouldn't give her any more chicken. Stupid assholes! Is there a cash prize involved in your show as well? Come on, Wing! She's got a hell of a chin on her, I'll give her that. Gay. Your gift of hope is a great deduction. Thanks, Mr. Stallone. We're just sorry she wasn't a better boxer. Four thousand dollars?? That's four hundred for us! We did it! Who let the dogs out? Who let the dogs out? Who let-? Naw, sh-she was with you! Wing? Wing?? Wing? Here, Wing! Not this time! They dropped their card. Now we know where CAA Talent Agency is! We're gonna march in there, and get our client back. Of course it's impressive! They steal everyone else's clients! Yeah, whatever. You can suck our balls. Oh my God, you guys. Look!  They do have an amazing fountain. Yeah, if these talent agents wanna play rouch, we can play rought too! Do you wanna play rough?! Okay!  Take this! Don't give us that crap! She's no good to you dead and you know it! Aw aw guys, come on! Token, you're... waiting tables? Mom, I told you! The new Sony PSP game machines go on sale at seven a.m. today. I have to be the first to get one! Come on! Everyone's moms are taking their kids after school! We're outsmarting everyone by getting to the store right when it opens! Let's go! I can't wait to see the look on everyone's faces when I show up to school with a PSP! I wonder if Kyle will cry? Oh PLEASE let Kyle cry!  What the hell?! Kenny, when did you get here? Friday?! Aw, Jesus!  I'll just... sort of get in here- in here. Uh, my friend Kenny was saving my place in line. Oh, Goddamnit!  They'd better not sell out! YES YES, I KNOW! UP YOURS, KYLE! JUST SHUT YOUR JEW MOUTH! Fag! Oh yeah! Oh yeah, baby! Who the man? Who the man? Who cares? Kenny's dead!  When do I take possession of my PSP, sir? Yes! Well... well then he's NOT alive. That's not Kenny. Kenny sniffs paint and sets things on fire! Here, look. Kenny, Kenny look. Want a dollar? Oh, I just remembered! Kenny told me this one time, that he wouldn't wanna be kept alive via feeding tube. Um, it was um, this one time... Stupid? PSP is stupid?!  Did you all hear that??  Uh I mean, I mean this isn't about PSP, Kyle! This is about my friend, and his wishes. And Kenny said he didn't want to live like this! Did so! Fine! We'll see about this, you freakin' Jew!  I'm gonna get that feeding tube removed if I have to go all the way to the Supreme Court! You see your honor, I was the only one that Kenny McCormick told his wishes to. And Kenny told me specifically that he would never want to be kept alive on a machine. What they're doing to him ...is not right. I do have legal authority, your honor. You see, I was Kenny's... BFF. That's right. Kenny and I have been BFFs since first grade. Here, look. Kenny has the other half of this BFF necklace. I believe you all know what that means, and how serious this is. He's right in here. That's right. Respect our authoritih-m. I believe the people at home see he's NOT in pain because he's a tomato! You say Kenny, but I say tomato! What? We're done! No more baseball! All right, we did it! Post-season? Nobody told us if we win too many games we'd go on to the finals! All right, hit one out of the park! Come on, kid, you gotta at least swing at it. All right! Ball. Balll. That was no strike, that was a terrible pitch! You need some Goddamned lasik surgery! What?! Aw Goddamnit! How the hell was that a strike?!  Goddamnit, he's going to first! What happens if we win the State Championship game? Wiat. I've got it, you guys. A fifth point in a sports movie, the team always goes out and finds a really sweet player to join their team. Exactly right, Clyde. So what we need... is to find somebody to join our team, who totally sucks ass. I don't think so! You guys are way too good! You're the best at this game! We're gonna lose! We're gonna lose! Stan, you said your mom was bringing Kentucky Fried Chicken home for dinner! Now is she or isn't she?! She's got Colonel! Oh boy! Some extra-crispy thighs, extra crispy? Come on guys. If we all help out, we can do it super-fast. Well, I saved you all the chicken part. Well, I gotta go home, guys. I'm gonna sit on the toilet and read comic books. See you at the bus stop tomorrow. Hey fags, what's going on?  Dude, I was on the toilet all night from that chicken. I thought I was gonna die. Oh wow, a Jew asking for money! There's a new one.  Yuh, you guys know why Jews have glassy eyes? Dude, Stan, yuh you know why Jews have glassy eyes? Like Kyle?  Eh. K-Kenny, you see that chick on the news that had her left titty cut off?  Kenny? Kenny??  Stan? Stan, it's me, Eric! Eh... Kenny. Kenny, you want fifty cents?  Dude, look at me, Kyle, I'm right here!  Wha...? How did...? Like they couldn't see or hear me. It's almost as if I were...  dead.  No. No, I can't be dead.  I can't be dead!! No! No!! Oh my God, this can't be happening! Mom? Mom's crying? Oh God, it is true! Oh, it's not fair!  Why??? Why??? Guys! Guys?  Can anybody hear me? You guys??  Token, Token, I'm here!  Hello! Hello! Hello!  Clyde, can't you feel me?  Feel me, Clyde!  Jimmy! Jimmy, it's me, Eric!  Jimmy!  Can't you feel your hair move?! That's me!  They don't even know yet, that one of their best friends is dead.  Dead and... still wandering the earth a lost soul. What did I do to deserve this?!  How can my own God forsake me?! Am I doomed to wander the Earth alone for all eternity?! ...What did you say? Butters...  Butters! You can see me?? Oh my God, and you can hear me?? Because, Butters, I'm... dead. Butters! Butters, I just want to talk to you! I ate a bunch of chicken skin and it blew out my insides. I don't know, but you're the only one who can. Butters!  Butters, Goddamnit, I need your help! Butters... Butters, you have to help me! All right, Butters, you leave me no choice. Butters. Butters, Goddamnit, I'm not in your imagination! I'm dead and for some reason you can see me! Get a hold of yourself! I'm the one who died! And for some reason, my spirit is trapped here on Earth. I can't find the passage to Heaven. What do you mean? I'm not going to Heck, Butters! I'm not black, all right?! Now look: I thnk the reason my soul is still here is because I need closure with all my friends and loved one. I can say my final goodbyes to them through you. This is your problem, Butters! Either you help me, or I will haunt you for the rest of your life! Tell her, tell her that I love her. Tell her, tell her that I wish... I wish I would have been a better son sometimes! It's just that, it's just that I got so caught up with the rat race of life tryin' to succeed that I... sometimes... took my family for granted! Just the good times. I can't! Don't you understand?! God forgave the Jews, you should be able to forgive me! All right, come on, Butters, we gotta go tell Token I'm sorry for rippin' on him for bein' black. Okay, that takes care of Token, Clyde, and Mr. Kitty. That's eveyone, I guess. All that leaves is you, Butters. Butters, I'm sorry if I ever did anything to hurt you. Well, it's all done. My soul is at peace. I think... I can go now. Don't be sad, Butters. What awaits each person in heaven is eternal bliss, divine rest, and ten thousand dollars cash. G'bye Butters. I'm goin' to a better place. Perhaps I'll see you again sometime! Good-bye!! Goddamnit, what the fuck is going on? What else do I have to do?! Atone? Not really... Let's see. Oh, and I broke Mr. Anderson's fence and never told him about it. I took a crap in the principal's purse... seven times. Then there was the time I convinced a woman to have an abortion so I could build my own Shakey's Pizza. I pretended to be retarded and joined the Special Olympics. I tried to have all the Jew exterminated last spring. Uuh, oh yeah, and there's this one kid whose parents I had killed and then made into chili which I fed to the kid. Really? I know how. Well, there's everything, Butters. I've made everything right. Yes, Butters, my soul is finally at peace. It's time for me to leave.  Goodbye Butters! Thanks for all your help! Be good and be safe. Goodbye...  Goddamnit, what?! I've made everything right! I want my eternal bliss! Do you think this is funny, God?!  Do you think this is funny,..? Butters. Don't worry, Butters, I'm gonna get you out of here. I found the woman you need to talk to for me. Look!  Doctor Lindsay, expert in the paranormal. She can tell us what to do! She's gonna close soon! Come on! I told you, Butters. Oh my God, this is it, Butters. This is what I'm here to stop. Come on, Butters. This psychic boy and his ghost pal are going to save the day! All right, Butters, I'm going in alone, first. Give me thirty seconds in there, and then you go in and free the hostiages. Don't worry. I have a plan. They can't hurt me, Butters. I'm already dead. Yes, it's working! Well, we did it, Butters. We saved the day. My spirit is at rest now. I can finally go to everlasting peace, eternal rest, and ten thousand dollars cash. Butters, I think that, through this whole thing, we've really become friends. We both, kind of needed each other and... well... I'm gonna miss you. Goodbye Buttters. I must be going now. I'll be looking down on you from time to time. Have a long, fulfilling life, Butters! Goodbyyye! You sonofabitch Butters! Hey, that's bullcrap?! How come Jimmy doesn't have to do it?! No room at the inn, Virgin Mary. Up yours, Butters. Jimmy, Jimmy, what the hell are you doing, man? Dude, you don't just go up to a girl and ask her if you can stick your penis in her vagina. Ye-you have to ask her on a date, take her out for some Italian food. Sure, lots of times. I've been laid, like, five thousand times. I told you: a date and then Italian food. And then you gotta make her thnk you're a good listener. Why sure, they do this all the time in movies and TV shows. You go on the date and wear an earpiece, and I'll be nearby, secretly telling you all the right things to say. Okay Jimmy. First off, tell her how good she looks. Jimmy! Jimmy! Jimmy, even though what she's saying now isn't interesting at all, you say, "Wow, that is very interesting. Please tell me more." All right, when she stops yappin' again, say "Wow, I've never thought of it that way before, but you're right." All right Jimmy, when she finally shuts her trap again, I want you to repeat whatever she said, and then follow it with "Wow, how insightful." Yes, nice, Jimmy, very nice. Aaagh! D'you know what you are? You're all a bunch of fucking cock roaches! You need people like me! You need people like me so you can point your fucking finger and say "That's the bad guy!" Well say goodnight to the bad guy!!

speaker: STAN
text: What's a dildo? What's a dildo, Kenny? Dude that kicks ass! Whoa, Cartman, looks like you didn't get much sleep last night. Dude! Visitors! That wasn't a dream, Cartman, those were visitors! Visitors are real! What's gonna be for lunch today, Chef? Yeah, fat boy saw it! They took him on their ship! What's an anal probe? Dude, they DID huh? Aliens stuck stuff up your ass! Good morning, Ms. Crabtree. Oh, don't worry about him. Yeah, whatever you fat bitch. I said I have a bad itch. Cartman, are those the same Visitors you saw?! Well, we can't do anything for now. That fat bitch won't let us. I-I said that rabbits eat lettuce. Okay, okay, let's ditch school and go find him- DUDE! Damn Cartman! (pointing to Cartman) It's the alien anal probe! It's shooting fire from Cartman's rectum!! How can you eat when you're farting fire? Where? Shut up Fat Ass! I don't even like her! I do not! Holy crap!  It says she wants to meet ME at Starks Pond after school. What? How do you know she has a cat? Ah Chef, Chef. Chef. Chef!!!!! -CHEF!! Visitors took Kyle's baby brother. Mr. Garrison won't let us out of school. He thinks we're making it up. Woa! Killer, thanks Chef. Okay, Cartman, you can stop farting fire now. What the hell was that?! KYLE, LOOK! It's them! Oh my God!! They killed Kenny! Hey, look - I think Kenny's okay! Wow, poor Kenny. Cartman, they KILLED Kenny! Dude, Kenny is dead! See?! Sorry dude, I gotta go meet Wendy Testaburger. Dude, like Chef says, I gotta get a piece of loving while the gettin's hot. But her note said she'd be here! Hey wait, when do I get to make sweet love? Don't be such a fraidy cat, Cartman! This rope will make sure they can't take you on board again. I think we need to signal the them somehow. Come on, Cartman! Fart! He can't hold it in forever. Hey! It's happening again! Now do you believe us Cartman?! Cartman!  There's an eighty-foot satellite dish sticking out of your ass! Go on, Kyle, ask them for your little brother back... Yeah... That was beautiful, dude. Nope, they're leaving. Woa, dude. Hey Wendy, what's a (BEEEEEP) I'm sure glad that's over with. Thanks for your help, Wendy. Hey I didn't throw up! Sorry. Cool! I think its part of a Cheesy Poof. Gee, the bus'll be here any minute and Cartman still isn't around. I wonder what that thing was the visitors gave the cows? Oh, hey Cartman! Really? What about? Yeah, what's there to HATE about rainbows?! Cartman, what the HELL are you talking about?!?! What were YOU talking about?! That's impossible!! Cartman doesn't know a rain forest from a pop-tart! Dude, Dolphin's are like the second smartest animal on the planet! Yeah, 'cause Cartman cheated and won the environmental essay contest. Yeah! That'd be cool! We don't believe for a minute that you won that contest fairly, fat boy! Dude, dolphins are intelligent and friendly!! Dolphins are way smarter than YOU! DOLPHINS DON'T LIVE IN IGLOOS! THAT'S ESKIMOS!! Tell me what you wrote about!! Yeah right, you'll go sit in front of the T.V. and eat Cheesy Poofs, assmaster! What?! You've got to weigh ninety- pounds! Super Fat Ass? Take THAT you stupid Indian! Shut up, Cartman! Wendy, you've got to Prioritize!! What's more IMPORTANT? Being on TV, or some stupid assassination?! Wendy, look! Mr. Garrison! Stop! Man, did she really throw her voice with TWO dummies at once? What about not holding anything against the person who wins? Come on, Wendy. Kyle's mom'll make us tuna fish sandwiches. We hope you can come back to school real soon, Mr. Garrison. Yeah, my uncle Jimbo says we got to get up there early! Right, Uncle Jimbo? Maybe your mom can give me a kiss too Cartman. Uh, Uncle Jimbo, we don't drink beer. You weren't in Vietnam, Cartman! Cartman always makes stuff up, Ned. You can't believe anything he says. My Uncle Jimbo says that after this, he's gonna take me hunting in Africa! Hey! It wasn't coming right for us! It was just sitting there! Wow, you're smart, Uncle Jimbo! Is this hunting? I can't... I don't wanna shoot the bunny. I'm not hysterical. I just don't want to shoot the bunny. I can shoot you fat ass! I'll kill you! No, no thanks, that stuff tastes like pee. Hey, I'm a dirty little bastard too. Whattlebutt? Why? A hook! Celery?! Cartman, you suck at telling scary stories! (Laughing) Maybe it's Scuzzlebutt coming to weave us into wicker baskets! (Groggily) What, dude? Well, where's my Uncle Jimbo and Ned? (Hurt) With Kenny? But, but this was supposed to MY camping trip... Why do they like Kenny so much? Doesn't he like me anymore? What? Uncle Jimbo! Cartman's missing! Yeah. Does it have Patrick Duffy for a leg? No, I can do it, Uncle Jimbo. I wanna bag that animal! I'm gonna bag Scuzzlebutt, then we'll see who's a little bastard! AW, DAMMIT! I CAN'T DO IT! Cartman? WOA!! I did it! I did it! I finally killed something! Hey! That was EASY! What? Why? No. But I just wanted you to be proud of me like you were with Kenny. That's my new dog, Sparky. (Proudly) He followed me to the busstop! Good boy, Sparky! Who's my best buddy? Who's your boy? Who's your buddy? He's part Doberman, and part wolf! He's the toughest dog on the mountain! He's not meaner than Sparky! Sparky'll kick his ass! That's it, Sparky kick his ass! Sparky?! Bad dog. WHAT? What do you mean? (To the boys) He's just confused. Sick, shut up, dude! HUT! HUT! HUT! HUT! HUT! HUT! HUT! HUT! HUT! HUT! HUT! HUT! Huh? Yeah, he must have followed me to football practice. You see? He IS smart! Yeah, but MY dog found his own way here! That makes him smarter than your -- SPARKY get down!! GET DOWN SPARKY! DOWN! Umm... I'm not really prepared either. Okay... Uh... Asian culture has... plagued our fragile Earth for many years. We must end it -- Wow, cool! Mr. Garrison, can I ask you a question? What's a... homosexual? I guess. Shut up, dude! Sparky! Where'd you get that pink scarf?! He just needs some training, that's all... Sit Sparky! Good boy... Now, Shake... Good boy... Now, DON'T BE GAY. DON'T BE GAY, Spark. DON'T BE GAY. I dunno. Come on you guys, I have an idea! Okay, Sparky, we got you a present. Now, why don't.... Dammit Sparky, where do you keep getting this thing?! NO PINK BANDANA, SPARKY! BAD DOG!! Now pay attention, Sparky... This is Fifi. Atta boy, Spark! Get her! YES!! AW CRAP!! Now what do I do?! I know, Mr. Garrison said that homosexuals are evil... But, but Sparky doesn't seem evil. Like who? Uh, hi, Jesus? I have a dog... And he's... Uh... He's a homosexual. DAMMIT! I got cut off for Marty's stupid Movie Reviews! ISN'T THERE ANYBODY WHO CAN HELP ME?!?! ISN'T THERE ANYBODY WHO CARES?! NO IT'S NOT OKAY!! I DON'T WANT A GAY DOG!!! I WANT A BUTCH DOG!! I WANT A RIN TIN TIN!! I just can't concentrate, 'cause my dog is gay. I don't know where Sparky is. He usually follows me to football practice. Have you guys seen Sparky? He still hasn't come back. I think he might have run away. I'm not playing. I'm not playing in that stupid game. I have to find my dog. Sparky! Where are you??!! Where could he be?! Sparky?! SPAAAARKY?! Fine, how are you? My gay dog ran away and I was wondering if maybe he came here. Do you have lots of gay dogs here? Wow, it seems like the animals here are really happy. SPARKY!! Hiya Sparky, how's it going? I missed you, old pal, you really had me scared. Come on, let's go home, I can still make it in time for the game. We can work on making you not gay together. Sparky? What don't I understand? This kicks ass! I'm sorry I tried to change you, Spark. I just didn't understand. Thanks for everything Big Gay Al! No thanks, I've gota get back for the big football game. Come on boy! I will Big Gay Al, I will. I've been getting my best friend back. HIKE! Uh... It... It's really cool that we beat the spread against the Cowboys. And... And maybe we can beat 'em even more next year! And it's okay to be gay! Being gay is just a part of nature, and a beautiful thing! I was with my new friend Big Gay Al. He showed me his Big Gay Animal Sanctuary and took me on a Big Gay Boat ride where I learned all about the wonders of gayety. It's true, I'll show you. But it was here... It was all right here. There was a techno dance club... Oh, there you are, dude. How's it going? Wow... NO! She's just pissed off 'cause she got head gear at the dentist. She's taking it out on me. My parents don't even believe that she beats me up. They think she's all innocent and sweet. But I know that she's an evil bitch. Hey Kyle, what's that elephant doing? Yeah. Wow, that's cool! That'd be cool! Wait, wait, we still need a pig. Okay... (hanging his head) Yes. Oh, neither, it's my sister. Hi Shelley. Head gear? What head gear? Oh, gosh. I didn't really notice. No! I think it looks terrific! It matches your -- Go where? Yeah, quit being such a baby. Least I'm not a little pig-#$%@er! Do you have anything besides just animals with four asses? -- Ow! Yeah, what kind of name is Pip, anyway? Yeah, go away Pip. Hey, Chef. I don't think an elephant would make love to a pig. Well how do we do that? Hey, uh you guys wanna come over to my house? Really? You guys don't want to come over just for a little bit? Shut up Cartman! Cartman, what the hell are you talking about? Sick dude! She's my sister! Crap. No. I mean yes, I mean, what neck brace? Shelley, before you beat my face into a bloody pulp again, I just want you to know that -- that you're my sister, and -- I love you. OW! Someday, Shelley, I'm gonna be bigger than you, and you're gonna wish you'd never done any of this to me. Damn, I wonder how drunk he needs to be to make sweet love to the pig? Oh, sick! I thought you said the wonder of mother nature was a beautiful thing. Uh, we saw an elephant have sex with a pig. A big mutant version of me?! How big do you think he is? I bet he weighs FOUR HUNDRED POUNDS! Officer Barbrady! My evil genetic clone is destroying the town! We have to find him! It wasn't me, Uncle Jimbo, it was my evil genetic clone. STOP!! That's good, that's good dude, just calm down. Stan... How would you like to go home and meet your sister? (to Big Stan) So remember, Shelley's the one with a big wire coming out of her mouth and a metal plate on her back. When you see Shelley, KICK HER ASS. Shelley bad! Shelley very bad!! No! SHELLY Bad! YOU GOOD!! Mom and Dad are home. My house is a disaster. You guys gotta help me!!! You can't just leave me here alone! Thanks a lot!!! It isn't fair! Everybody hates me! The whole town wants me killed! (Crying) Mom and Dad are gonna send me away! I don't wanna be sent away! I want to stay here! WAAAGGHH!!! Shelley, you -- you saved my life! And yet, you've done so much more than that. Today, you've taught me the meaning of family. Sure, families don't always get along. But when the forces of evil descend upon us, we conquer them. By sticking together. I will. It's eight o'clock! My favorite T.V. show is on! Can I eat my cake in the living room, mom? Please? Can I? Aw, dammit. My name's not Billy, grandpa, it's Stan. Sure. I'm not going to kill you, grandpa. 'Cause! I'll get in trouble! Leave me alone, grandpa. I'm not going to kill you, grandpa! G'night grandpa. Whew! Smells like you slaughtered a cow in there, Kenny! Is it okay to kill somebody if they want you to?  STAN My grandpa keeps asking that I kill him all the time, and sometimes I wonder if I should. Really? Wow. So IS it okay to assist somebody with suicide, Mr. Garrison? Don't worry, dude. We can all go watch it at my house! My parents don't get home until late. Yeah... Hey Chef. Bad. Chef, Is it okay to kill your grandpa? No I mean kill MY grandpa. See, I told you, dude. What's the big deal? Why won't anybody talk about this? Hi, Grandpa. I brought my friends over to watch T.V. if that's okay. No Grandpa, I'll get in trouble! No! I can't even kill a deer! GRANDPA!! Come on, Cartman, he's just trying to get to you! We can go watch Terrance and Phillip in the kitchen. Here, Cartman, have some snacky cakes. I don't know what to do, dude. My Grandpa really wants to die. Hey yeah, good idea. Jesus? Jesus, is it okay to kill somebody if they ask you to because they're in a lot of pain? You know, like assisted suicide. Is that okay? Yes? GOD DAMMIT!! What the hell is wrong with everybody?! Yeah! Kyle, don't be a butthole! Okay, grandpa, okay. Just get out of the way of the T.V. We're not watching Terrance and Phillip, I swear! I mean... CARTMAN was watching it. AGH! We didn't know what we were doing. We were just sitting there watching 'Terrance and Phillip' and -- Yeah! I hope they protest T.V. shows forever! WHOOPEE!!!! Aw, do I have to? Hey, what are you doing? I guess. Okay, you can let me out now. LET ME OUT, GRANDPA!! I can't take it anymore! This music is terrible!! It's cheesy but lame and eerily soothing at the same time!! Grandpa... I... I had no idea how bad it was for you... Now I understand... Sure I will grandpa... I will. Okay, grandpa, all you have to do is sit there. We'll do the rest. You got the cow all tied up? Kay, come on, guys. You dumbass, Cartman! It has to look natural, or else we'll all get busted. Are you ready grandpa? Okay, here we go... Bye Grandpa, it was nice knowing you. Whoa... It looks like... death! Hey, he's coming towards US! Mom, death is here and he's trying to take all of us away with him. Yeah, but mom -- Dad, death is coming -- Dammit! You know, I think that if parents would spend less time worrying about what their kids watch on T.V. and more time worrying about what's going on in their kids' lives, this world would be a much better place. Good point man. AAGH!! AAGH!! Hey look! Wow, I guess Death was just coming after Kenny the whole time. Whoa... C'mon you guys, let's go home. What do you mean? I dunno... We could start breathing gas fumes... Cool! OH MY GOD! They killed Kenny! Hey, man, we gotta get home and get our costumes ready! Shut up, Kyle! I'm Raggedy Andy. Wendy's going as Raggedy Anne. And she said this way we'd win the costume contest for sure. Wendy said that first prize is two tons of candy! Where'd you get that? No, I'm Raggedy Andy, fat ass! I'll kick your ass, Kyle! You forgot to wear a costume Kenny. Yeah, why is your family so poor, Kenny. Ah, we're ALWAYS running late you ugly skank. I said I can't wait to own a fishing tank. Whoa dude! Wendy? You said we were going to be Raggedy Anne and Andy, remember? We were going to enter the costume contest as a pair! You WHAT?!! He hasn't moved an inch or said anything. Oh Good! Kenny's back to normal! Oh man, I feel like a total chode. Hey, where's Kyle? Whoa, dude! Yea, me too. (muttering) Thanks a lot, Wendy. You RUINED my Halloween! I don't want to trick or treat with you! You lied to me!! I bet I get more candy than you, dude. No no, you're the ASS Master. There's a difference. Oh yeah?! Well, at least MY mom's not on the cover of Crack Whore Magazine!! Oh good you're here. Now, let's make sure we've got everything. Flashlight? Plastic pumpkin pails? Tazer? For shocking people who try to give us granola treats or something. (Sarcastic) How's your barrel full of candy, Wendy? I don't think so, Wendy. I think you've had enough candy for one day! Trick or treat with yourself, Wendy! No buts Wendy, I wish you were dead! Dude, Kenny! Yeah! She had Sweetie Pops! Yeah! That's it, Kenny! You can't trick or treat with us anymore! What are you talking about Chef? (realizing) Oh my God! That means... Wait, where are we going? I don't know about this, Chef. What are we doing here, Chef? What? We TOLD you, dude!! Hey Chef, look! AAAGH!!! Okay, Chef, dial the hotline number!! Chef? Let's get outta here!! We gotta call that Worchestershire hotline! You call the number, Kyle! We'll hold 'em off!! Sweet! Wendy? I know, but... but Hey yeah... Wendy! I know we had a fight, and I did wish that you were dead, but I didn't mean it! I... I can't! Don't worry, babe. Everything's gonna be okay. That's okay, Wendy. I'm sorry I wished you were dead. Oh, man... I can't believe he's gone... Dude, you're the one who cut him in half with a chainsaw. You know I've really learned something today... Halloween isn't about costumes or candy... It's about being good to one another and giving and loving. Oh... Then what's Halloween about? Oh. (Off-screen) Cartman! The pictures were taken like last month!! Oh, Sweet! Your mom is giving you a big party again this year? Yeah, if MY mom could cook like Cartman's mom, I'd be a big fat ass too. Woa, dude! Hey Cartman, how come the birthday invitation you gave me says 'Green Mega Man'? Dude! You're not supposed to TELL people what to get you for your birthday! Up yours, Cartman. I'll get you whatever the hell I want! Oh, Green Mega-Man it is. Hey, what do you think you're doing, new kid? Hey new kid! Kenny says he saw your mom drop you off this morning, and she's a REAL DOG! They were considered the best comedy act in all of Canada.  But a fast-paced rocket ride to success would bring themto the depths of despair.  This is Terrance and Phillip: Behind the Blow. Terrance was born Terrance Herny Stoot, in the small Canadian village of Toronto. At a very early age his parents noticed an uncanny musical ability and decided to enroll him in the Canadian School for gifted babies.  It was here that he partnered up with Phillip Niles Argyle , a brash young baby from Montreal. Together, they performed musical acts that stunned Canadians everywhere. At the tender age of six, Terrance and Phillip were off to the United States to perform on the Ed Sullivan show . where American audiences would be exposed to Canadians for the first time. The Canadian act confused American audiences. But then something happened that would change Terrance and Phillip's act forever. It was the birth of Canadian comedy. Terrance and Phillip spent the next several years perfecting their art, and meetng some of America's most infuential people. But it was in 1974, on the Sonny & Cher Show, that Terrance and Phillip finally started to mix their Canadian humor with deep political insight. With this bold mix of humor and political insight, the world couldn't get enough of Terrance and Phillip.  But their fame would come at a price, when Behind the Blow continues. As they entered their late teens, Terrance and Phillip were already starting to taste the sweet milk of success.  But the price of fame was looming, as Terrance and Phillip: Behind the Blow continues. The '70s and '80s were a good time for young Terrance and Phillip.  Their act on the Donny and Marie Show earned them a Nobel Peace Prize. They were oin the cover of every magazine.  And then in 1998, even a saturday morning cartoon was made, based on Terrance and Phillip.  Terrance and Phillip themselves supplied the voices. The cartoon was such a huge success that it started to breed confusion over whether Terrance and Phillip were animated characters or real people. And so, in 1998,  the comedy team started work on what they thought would be their greatest achievement: A made-for-TV movie written by and starring Terrance and Phillip, called "Not Without My Anus."  It was their biggest project to date. But it had the misfortune of being scheduled on a night when a different and more pupolar show, the John Schneider Variety Hour , was supposed to air. When fans tuned in to see John Schneider and instead were treated to the Canadian made-for-TV movie , they were enraged, bewildered, and scared.  The fans revolted and burned down the network, killing six television producers and wounding twelve others.  The hatred of Terrance and Phillip had begun. Terrance fell into a deep depression and started abusing wod pulp  Phillip beat up an angry six-year-old fan and was sued for six million dollars. It was the first time the duo tasted failure , and it nearly killed them both. After years of depression and suicide attempts, Terrance and Phillip finally decided to get together  for one last film:  the 1999 hit, Asses of Fire. It was one of the highest-grossing films of the summer.  And though the film also started the Canadian-American War of 1999 , in which eight million people lost their lives, the film was conisdered a great success.  After almost being executed by the Aemrican government , Terrance and Phillip were eventually returned to Canada , where they were touted as heroes.  They have been to hell and back, through the very best and the very worst of times, together, but they had seen it through.  And so ends Terrance and Phillip, Behind the Blow. Snacky S'mores presents: The Miracle of Child Birth.  The time is drawing close for delivery. Here we can see the water breaking. Later, the contractions are happening closer together. Mom sure is in a lot of pain. Now we can see the crown of the baby's head, stretching the vaginal walls in ways never before thought possible by Mom. Finally, the miracle happens, and the baby is born.  but Mom's not done yet. She still got some afterbirth to push out of her. That's right. The story begins in ages past, in the deep regions of Middle Earth, where Scorn first thrived in the kingdom of Gelgelar. Seven rings were cast and given to the races of men. Seven, to the races of elves, five to the gloondock villagers of Gelgendor. So it was that the heroes traveled many miles to return the Lord of the Rings to the video store. The quest continued to return the Lord of the Rings to the video store. Looks like them boys are gettin' a little fresh air. Well, it looks like the boys are in more trouble than a June bug in molasses. And it's pretty thick molasses, too. ...The little woodland critters were also preparing for their Christmas day. The little critters worked hard as they happily sang And so, using some paper and working with glee, The little critters cheered and Beavery said with a smile The boy in the red poofball hat smiled and said His friends were all there! What a wonderful surprise! "Of course I'll build you a little manger!" the little boy cried, And out in the woods the boy steamed right ahead, High up in the forest on a dark, craggy peak, Said the little boy in the red poofball hat. In a flash it was over! A victorious blow! The tiny cubs all gathered together and cried, In the gentle forest clearing on Christmas Eve morn, Now that he'd killed the noble lion queen, "I know!" he said with a new happy grin, He ran out the living room, turned out the light, ... and went back to the forest to set everything right! He knew that only by going to the forest could he- The boy shook with anger! He broke a sweat and fell ill "Where can they learn that?" the boy said with a frown. So he picked up the cubs and down the mountain he stormed. Yes he did. Yes he did. Yes he  did! Said the boy in the red poofball hat! "We've made it already, little cubs! Fancy that!" The abortion doctor inquired. And so the little boy and the cubs gathered around the chair base, Twas the night before Christmas, and above the woods, way up high, He arrived at the critter forest ready to fight, The Antichrist had been born, sealing the world's fate. He almost started to bawl The little boy quickly begun, And in the twinkling starlight, each little cub did their portion. And back home, there were presents, and lots of food to get fat. And they all lived happily ever after. Except for Kyle, who died of AIDS two weeks later.

speaker: NEWS ANCHOR
text: The people of South Park are humble and friendly. But now, a ticking time bomb of hot lava waits to engulf these people and end their miserable lives with one last fleeting moment of excruciatingly painful, burning agony. Mayor, what are you doing to prepare for this inevitable catastrophe? Huh? And in other news, it appears that Saddam Hussein has finally signed an agreement to let the US inspect his military operations. When asked if he would uphold his side of the agreement, Hussein replied, quote 'Hey, relax fella, you need a rest, guy'. And in other news tonight it appears that everyone is officially SICK OF CHRISTMAS!  In an SPC poll, 38% said they were fred up and tired of the holiday, 5% said they were indifferent to it, and a whopping 57% they would quick Bon Jovi square in the balls if given the opportunity. Well, the holiday spirit may be gone from South Park, but at least our faith in each other remains strong. Oh really? ... but Hillary Clinton's ass just keeps getting bigger.  Also in the news tonight, a vandal has apparently cut off and stolen the head of the Powell statue in the South Park Town Square. The head was taken in the early morning hours and the police have no leads. This act, of course, reminded us all of the time that Bart Simpson  took the head of the Springfield statue in one of their classic episodes. Here's what some people had to say: The police say that instead of looking for the missing head, they'd rather leave it off and be reminded of the Simpsons every day. And in other news, still no known cause of death found for elementary school teacher Diane Choksondik. However, doctors say that during the autopsy they did find semen in her stomach. The autopsy is ongoing and cause of death is yet to be determined. And in other South Park News, elementay school teacher Ms. Choksondik's  autopsy has shown that the semen in her stomach belongs to school counselor, Mr. Mackey. However, the semen apparently did NOT contribute to the death, and so Mr. Mackey's identity is to remain anonymous. Our top story tonight, the age-old question has been answered: if I put food up my ass, will I crap out my mouth? All over the country, people are discovering that, yes, in fact, you will.  The sugeon-general had this to say: The Surgeon-General's response has made Americans change their eating habits almost instantly. The Mayor of South Park has announced that for first discovering this healthy way of eating, young citizen  Eric Cartman will be given... a freaking medal. This was the second time a terrorist threat has been made on a theme park, leaving everyone to realize that children are not safe outside. And it seems there's a new danger to look out for: children who are taken by strangers. The bottom line: children are not safe... in their own homes! And this newest study reveals more about child abductions than we apparently knew before, Tom. And so all the residents of Manhattan are prepared to evacuate if Ms. Clinton's ass gets any bigger. And in other news, new findings on the increase in child abductions. The study shows that the most likely abductors of children... are the parents themselves!  The study reveals that nine out of every ten abduction cases are commited by the child's mother or father. The bottom line being that your children aren't safe, even from you! Finally, some good news tonight. It's been several days since any child abductions have taken place. The main reason: parents don't know where their children are.

But freedom is a two-way street. If I'm free to express myself, then the Scouts have to be free to express themselves, too. I know these men. They are good men. They are kind men. They do what they think is best for kids. No matter how wrong we think they might be, it isn't right for us to force them to think our way. It's up to us to persuade, and help them see the light, not extort them to. Please, don't cut the Scouts' funding. The Scouts help and have always helped a lot of kids. That's why I love them. I will continue to persuade them to change their mind, but this is the wrong way to do it. So, I am hereby dropping my case, and allowing the Scouts their right to not allow gays into their private club. Come on kids, let's go get some ice cream!

Tom, I'm standing in South Park, Colorado, where last December, eight-year-old Kenny McCormick died of a terminal illness. But now, that little boy's three closest friends miss their friend so much that they are building a ladder to heaven, in order to-  a ladder to heaven in order to try to see him again.  It's so sad and yet so beautiful, Tom. Here's what some people had to say. Tom, people from all over the-  Sorry. People from all over the country are coming to see the ladder, feeling a connection to its symbolism, and beauty. Even country singer Alan Jackson has shown up with a song he has written about the ladder.  Alan Jackson is, of course, the man who wrote the song, "Where Were You When the World Stopped Turning," about the tragedies on September 11. And now he's here once again to capitalize on people's emotions. Let's listen in. Tom, it's been five days since three sweet boys set out to build a ladder to heaven and caption the nation's hearts. They've made a nation believe heaven might be up there. And it could prove to be a threat to our country. President Bush will seek UN approval for military action. But... what about yoru lost friend? What about your fragile innocence and believing we could all get to heaven? Tom, I'm standing in chilly South Park, Colorado, where the residents are entering the third day of their sit-in to try and stop Native Americans from building a superhighway through their town. The temperature is low, but spirits are pretty low, too. Tom, it now looks as if the Native Americans are handing out blankets as a sign of goodwill towards the South Park people. What an incredible display of compassion. I certainly hope there's nothing sinister behind it. Tom, it's Tuesday morning now, and the outbreak of SARS in South Park has reached epic proportions.  The entire town has been quarantined by the federal government, nobody allowed in our out, which means, nobody can come to our aid.  It appears this town, and this reporter, are done for. Coming up next, choosing the right hair conditioner. What you don't know about hair care products could be costing you a bundle. Tom, I'm standing in South Park, Colorado, where the rock band, MOOP, has refused to play. The strike started yesterday and could go well into next week. Tom, we're now entering the second day of the rock band MOOP's refusal to play, and the second day of absolutely no other news to report on. In a recent poll we asked people if MOOP's refusal to play would stop them from downloading music off the Internet. One percent said yes. Two percent said no. And ninety-seven percent said, "Who the hell is MOOP?!" Back to you, Tom. Tom, it appears now the musicians' strike is growing! As I'm speaking, more musicians are arriving! It looks like Alanis Morissette, Blink 182, Britney Spears, and dozens of others are going to join MOOP in not playing music. This is a veritable Strikapalooza! Tom, I'm standing outside of the Department of Motor Vehicles, where senior citizens have until three p.m. to hand over their driver's licenses. The new law was passed just three days after the Night of Horror, in which all seniors were out driving at the same time, causing fourteen deaths and three million dollars in damage. Tom, it has now been three days since the Stotch child has gone missing. Townspeople continue to search, but hope... is dwindling.

A giant half-chickenhalf-squirrel that steals either teeth or money from children as they sleep in order to build some kind of giant nest  for its genetically superior and potentially dangerous offspring! text: Well, the very next day, Pip went to Old Ms. Havesham's house to inquire about the job.  and it was there that he met the girl of his dreams. And although she treated him like dirt, or perhaps because she treated him like dirt, Pip found himself more in love with the little girl each and every day.  Oh, bless him! Isn't he lovely??  But, isn't it sad? Because Pip knew that someone as sophisticated and as wealthy as Estella could never love him, for he was just a simple blacksmith's apprentice. And so Pip spent the next several months learning how to be a gentleman. He was schooled in several languages. He was taught fencing and marksmanship, and he was shown how to dance and eat box. And after it all, after WEEKS and weeks of intense schooling, Pip was finally a full-fledged gentleman. Proud of himself, Pip decided to pay Ms. Havesham a visit, to thank her for her generosity, and to see if he was indeed, now, good enough for Estella. Yes. Our young Pip had come a long way. From the apprentice of a blacksmith to a fine young gentleman of great expectations. And now he was to finally see his beloved Estella again at a Grand Ball held by the King of England, Tony Blair. It was here that Pip would finally and formally ask Estella to be his girlfriend. And all would be right with the world. And now we come to the final act of the Dickens classic tale, inwhich the stage is set for an epic showdown. Ms. Havesham's robot monkeys prove a formidable foe, but Pip is not about to let Estella's soul be forever consumed by the Genesis device. And now the thrilling conclusion of Great Expectations!

Come on, sweetie. Doctor says you need to get home and get lots of rest. What is it, sweetie? Oooo, looks like the tooth fairy was extra-happy with youuu. Boys, you have a little visitor. Eric, where have you been? It's ten thirty. Well you should've called Mommy. Well, why don't you get ready for snoogums' night-night, and I'll bring you some toasty chocolate nummers? Eric, you've done a lot of horrible things in your life, but smoking? You're grounded for three weeks! Oh my goodness, I had no idea.  Are you okay, sweetie? That's a great idea, Chef. Yes, hon? What's that, hon? Oh... Nno, sweetie. I believe those Olympics are just for ..."special" children. You are, hon, but... I don't think that's a very good idea. ...I'm sorry, Eric. The answer is No. Oh, a-a-all right, sweetie, I, I'll take you tomorrow. Hello. Um, I would like to... sign my son up, please. Eric Cartman He's nine. ...Um, he's retarded. Ohhh, oh. I'm not sure.  Sweetie, what is yoru condition? Eric, sweetie, there's a bunch of people showing up in our backyard saying something about a meeting? Oh, that's great, sweetie. Okay, hon. Oh, I'm so glad to hear it, Mrs. Stotch. Eric has been having some emotional problems lately. Oh, well, I'm not sure. Actually, Eric is still supposed to be grounded for trying to exterminate the Jews two weeks ago. Oh, but I suppose it would be good for him. Yes, of course he can go. I'll bring some of clothes over. Oh my God! Eric! Eric,  Mommy's here. Sweetie?  Oh what's wrong with him? Coma... My God, for- for how long? Oh my... Doctor!  He's awake! Oh, you've finally come back! It's a miracle! You're doing so much better, muffin. Oh, you're sounding just like your old self again. His new... powers? Oh he will. My little poopsiekins is a very good little boy. Eric, sweetie, there's um, some people here to see you. Ah, no, these people claim that they are the "real" psychic detectives. Oooh, I'll go make some tea. Oh, poopsies, what's going on? O-o-o-o-o-oh! Is it over? Oh, Poopie-kins, it's very early. Sweetie, can't we go after school? Oh, you've been so helpful, I uh, just don't know how to thank you. Ohoho, nhn. Yes?  Oh hi. Oh, what is it? Oh, that's so nice. Oh, that's so sweet. Oh, I love you too, poopiekins! That's my little boy.

speaker: KYLE
text: -Ah damn it, my little brother's trying to follow me to school again. Ike, you can't come to school with me! Dude! Don't call my brother a dildo. I don't know... and I'll bet Cartman doesn't know either! Well, what?! Yeah! Check this one out! (to Ike) Ready Ike? Kick the baby Kick the baby. Really, what about? Totally! Yeah, they abduct people and they mutilate cows! Woa! They gave you an anal probe, Cartman? We told you they were real Cartman. Sorry to hear about your ass. Why are you walking so funny, Cartman? No, Ike! Go home! This is it!! This one's for the game. Kick the baby. Dammit, he's still there! No, dude, if something happens to him my parents are gonna blame me! OH MY GOD!!!! Ike!!! STOP THE BUS! Ms. Crabtree, you have to stop this bus! (SCARED) No. But I.... AAHHH!!!!! We have to do something! What am I going to do? My little brotherü¾£¤¼s been abducted by aliens. You farted! "You weren't looking out for your little brother Kyle!" "You know he can't think on his own, Kyle. Brush and Floss, Kyle!" "Where has that finger been, Kyle?!" Yes, Mr. Garrison, I have to go now. No, my little brother has been abducted by aliens. It's true! Ask Cartman, they gave him an anal probe! Mr. Garrison, seriously, I HAVE to go!  Can I PLEASE be excused from class? I don't want to ask Mr. Hat, I'm asking YOU! (SIGHING) Mr. Hat, may I please be excused from class?... Dammit! Dude, he's farting fire! Hey look! There's Wendy Testaburger! Dude, what does the note say?! Whoa, maybe you can kiss her. C'mon you guys, we need to figure out how to get out of school so we can get my little brother back! Bad. Chef, have you ever had something happen to you... But nobody believed you? No! That was cool! (pleading) Please Chef, if I don't get out of school and get my little brother back from the aliens, my parents are gonna disown me. Okay, so how do we get my little brother back? He is under alien control. That thing in his butt is linked up to the visitors. HEY!! IF YOU VISITORS CAN HEAR ME -- BRING ME BACK MY LITTLE BROTHER GOD DAMMIT! GIVE ME BACK MY BROTHER! YOU BASTARDS!! COME BACK HERE!! COME BAAAAACK! DAMMIT! We were so close! Now do you believe us Cartman? (Pulling Kenny's head off) He's DEAD, Cartman. Go on and go home you Fat Chicken! You're all I have left, Stan. You can't! Poor Ike must be so scared... Up there all alone... You gotta help me dude! Rats! Well, looks like she's not gonna show up, Stan. Let's go look for the visitors now. You can't talk to Stan, Wendy, he throws up when you do. Look, could you guys just get down to business so we can go find my little brother? Just make sweet love down by the fire. ...And now I have to go home without him and my parents are going to have me killed! Why? Hey, you're right Wendy! C'mon Stan, We have to go get Cartman! Come on, Eric, we're going to go play at the bus stop. How come the visitors aren't coming for him? Yeah all you have to do is fart some more, Cartman, and the visitors are sure to come. Sure you do! Fart Damn you! Woa! Look at that! Come down here you stinkin' aliens! (Tenderly) V-Visitors...  This morning you took my brother, Ike.  He's the little freckled kid that looks like a football... At first I was happy you took him away... But I've learned something today; that having a little brother is a pretty special thing. Aw, heck, Mr. Visitors, I'm just a kid all alone in this crazy world, but if you could just find it in your hearts or whatever you have to give my brother back to me, it sure would make my life brighter again (still looking down) Did it work? HEY YOU SKRAWNY ASS (BEEP)-HEADS! WHAT'S THE (BEEP) IS WRONG WITH YOU, YOU (BEEP) LITTLE (BEEP). YOU MUST BE SOME KIND OF (BEEP) TO BE ABLE TO IGNORE A CRYING CHILD. YOU KNOW WHAT YOU LIKE!? I BET YOU'D ALL LIKE TO (BEEP) YOUR OWN (BEEP) WHILE SHE (BEEP) ON YOUR (BEEP) (BEEP)!! Ike! Jump down now for the love of God Ike, JUMP!!!! Come on, Ike! I promise I'll be nice to you from now on! Ike!!!!! Ike! Do your impersonation of David Caruso's career. Yeah, boy am I glad to see you, Ike! C'mon Ike, we can make it just in time for dinner. Yeah, we're running out of friends. Wow, Cartman, the visitors dropped you off just in time to go to school! Nobody HATES rainbows. Rainbows are little arches of color that show up during a rainstorm! No! What marches in, crawls up your leg and bites the inside of your ass?! Wow, what did you write about, Cartman? What was your paper about, Wendy? Kathie Lee is coming to South Park? Wow, are you gonna do it? What the hell is wrong with you, Cartman? Haven't you noticed the three feet of snow on the ground? Yeah, they're almost as big as his mom's! What's that stuff? Bulk up to what? Fat Ass? Whoa Cartman, talk about wide load! You're not 'filling out nicely', you're fatter than ever! Cartman, you're SUCH a fat ass, that when you walk down the street people go 'GOD DAMN IT, THAT'S A BIG FAT ASS!' I don't think they're gonna be able to get all of you in frame, Cartman. Stop who? Uh-oh, we're losing him. Oh my God! they killed Kenny! (Shaking his fist) You bastard! Hey!! Come back!! We didn't even get to do our play!! Not Cartman, he get's to be on T.V. anyway. I think something took him away! They're out fishing with Kenny. Well Stan, you want to know what I think? Look! Dude, it's Scuzzlebutt! Cartman wasn't lying! Look up there! Kill it Stan. Kill it! C'mon Stan kill it! Oh my God! they killed Kenny! Oh my God!! Look at his leg! AAAAGGHHH!! Whoa, he built a wicker basket. Hey look, Kenny's OK. Yea, make up your mind dude. Who's that? Wow, cool! You're on, dude! I think the OTHER dog's the one that's confused. Who's Middle Park? Hey Stan, isn't that your dog? You're gonna need to kick more ass than that to beat the Cowboys. Did it work? Ooh la la! Who cares if your dog is gay. Maybe it's not that bad. Well, maybe Mr. Garrison is wrong. You should ask somebody else. What'd he say? Come on, dude, we have to get to practice. Cartman you hike me the ball. Then somebody run and I'll throw it or something. Ready... Set... Set... DAMMIT CARTMAN!! Cartman farted! No way, dude! Oh, dude, weak. HIKE! OH MY GOD! THEY'VE KILLED KENNY! YOU BASTARDS!! Hey Stan! I'm open I think!! Yeah, but that sucks you get your butt kicked by a girl Stan. You mean this one? He's my new pet elephant. And that its poop is bigger than our couch. Well yeah, but pigs aren't smart like elephants. (Whispering) Uh, oh this is the new retarded kid. Boy, it looks like you're not welcome anywhere elephant. Why is your sister so mean to you, dude? This must be it. No Cartman! We're going in there and splicing Fluffy and my elephant together. It's just a stupid pig. Which song is that? Wait, what are you taking Stan's blood for? Watch out Stan, genetic engineers are crazy!!! No, we're already half-way done! It's more than you've got. Oh my God! They cloned a foot! We need to genetically engineer a pig and an elephant, but their genes won't splice. I told you guys. You hear that, dudes? We'll be rich! We've got work to do Stan. I think it takes a while for an elephant to get drunk. Yeah Stan, she's just a girl. Stan, you can use family love as a weapon against Shelley. The next time she's going to kick your ass just tell her 'Shelley, you're my sister and I love you.' Try it. We'll see you in a while, we've got to go get Cartman's pig. Come on Kenny! Come on, Elephant! Keep drinking! Dammit! This is never gonna work!! Rotten! They're both really drunk, but they won't have sex. Hey, look! It's working! Yeah. When does mother nature go from "beautiful" to "ugly"? Hey, how do we know if she's pregnant? A couple of days? But Terrance is going to have his human clone by tomorrow! Is he bigger than a regular clone?! Come on, Stan! Don't you even know where you would go? Oh my God! Come on! Let's go! Wait Stan! There he goes! He recognizes you, dude. What should we do with him? He's tearing up the house. Stop him!!! Oh my God! They killed Kenny! (shaking his fist at the microwave) You bastard!! Yeah Stan, we have to go find out if Cartman's pig is pregnant or not. See ya! Well, our pig hasn't given birth yet, but she should any time now. Wait, Wait, the pig just gave birth, it had a baby!!! Does it look like a pig or an elephant? (Collecting himself) Dude, it's 'Terrance and Phillip'. But EVERYBODY watches Terrance & Phillip! OW! What the hell was that for?! Well, I didn't have her do it, she did it on her own! Well then you should. I think that a person has a right to die if they wanna. Yeah, there's this guy named Jack Laborkian that goes around and murders people that ask him to, and he doesn't get in trouble at all. But won't your grandpa be there? Well yeah, but what if the grandpa wants to die, 'cause he's really old, and he's just asking for help? I'm telling you, it's okay. Maybe you should ask the Lord for guidance. Hey, do you think we'll get in trouble for watching it? Don't call my mom a bitch, Cartman! Dude, he's gonna fart on his head again!! Dude! This is SWEET not having any parents around! What are they doing in there? Yep, all done. Yeah, stupid. Whoa, what is that?! Yes, I think that parents get only get so offended by television because they rely on it as a babysitter and the sole educator of their kids. Totally dude. Quick! Jump out the window!! Don't let him touch you! You die if he touches you!! AAGH!! Oh my God! They killed Kenny!! (To Death) You bastard!! Hey Stan, now that Terrance and Phillip has been taken off the air, what are we going to do for entertainment? Hey! Why don't we go watch some of those porno movie thingies? You bastards!! It looks like a UFO! Dude, it can't be cooler than mine! Ha ha! You look like a pansy! What are you supposed to be? (Laughing) Why the hell did you dress up like Raggedy Andy, dude?! No way, dude. (also realizing) ...if everyone has been turned into Zombies... Chef! You've got to help us! Yeah. I'm scared. I found it!! I found it!!! See Cartman?! Your mom IS on the cover! Chef!! Hey look you guys! THE DIGITAL SPORTS WATCH IS HERE!!! Hey... It looks like one of those Etheropians. Maybe they took it literally when we said we wanted to adopt a kid! Whoa! That was cool! But I thought we were supposed to care on Thanksgiving. Because why? Then you take care of him. You better watch what you say Cartman. You might be poor and hungry some day. Wow! Those are some PISSED OFF turkeys!! I don't know. Do you know where he is Marvin? Here you go turkeys! You bastards!!! Yeah, I like him a lot more than Cartman. Yeah... (Thinking) And that means that McGyver is a real person too. Come on, Mary, PUSH!! I can see its head!!! It's a boy!! Sorry. Shut up, fat boy! I can sing the Mr. Hankey song! Mr. Hankey the Christmas Poo! He loves me, and I love you! Mr. Hankey the Christmas poo, haven't you guys ever heard of it? We can too! OFFICER BARBRADY!! He comes out of the toilet every year and gives presents to everybody who has a lot of fiber in their diet.
